item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, November 27, 2024 at 3:00 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Hacker in Snowflake extortions may be a U.S. soldier (67 points | 11 comments)
2. Launch HN: Human Layer (YC F24) – Human-in-the-Loop API for AI Systems (260 points | 157 comments)
3. Executing ARM Jazelle (JVM Bytecode) on the Wii's Starlet (28 points | 2 comments)
4. Teen mathematicians tie knots through a mind-blowing fractal (172 points | 33 comments)
5. GenChess (148 points | 113 comments)
6. A solution to The Onion problem of J. Kenji Lopez-Alt (2021) (281 points | 111 comments)
7. ZetaOffice: LibreOffice in the Browser (87 points | 19 comments)
8. Marshall Brain died hours after alleging retaliation at NC State (112 points | 38 comments)
9. Show HN: Clean Your Mac with a Script (22 points | 8 comments)
10. Git-crypt – transparent file encryption in Git (46 points | 21 comments)
11. Htmy – Async, pure-Python rendering engine (3 points | discuss)
12. Show HN: SQLite Plugin for Jekyll (171 points | 51 comments)
13. LLVM-powered devirtualization (179 points | 6 comments)
14. We can mine asteroids for space food (127 points | 139 comments)
15. Show HN: I created a lightweight JavaScript library to visualize JSON as a graph (13 points | 12 comments)
16. ISPs say their "excellent customer service" is why users don't switch providers (106 points | 71 comments)
17. Imperfect Parfit (3 points | 1 comment)
18. D-Link says it won't patch 60k older modems (98 points | 47 comments)
19. Show HN: Silent Poems – Visual expression of unspoken thoughts (82 points | 22 comments)
20. FQL: A KV Query Language (21 points | discuss)
21. Setelinleikkaus: When Finns snipped their cash in half to curb inflation (196 points | 181 comments)
22. Ask HN: Has anyone tried adapting a court reporter keyboard for writing code? (42 points | 45 comments)
23. Creating a social photo frame from scratch (8 points | 1 comment)
24. Apple Rhapsody Report (1997) (18 points | 8 comments)
25. Henry James and H.G. Wells (1958) (48 points | 29 comments)
26. The AI reporter that took my old job just got fired (250 points | 292 comments)
27. Sombrero Galaxy dazzles in new James Webb image (40 points | 24 comments)
28. The industry structure of LLM makers (106 points | 104 comments)
29. Remembering Cyberia, the first ever cyber cafe (103 points | 60 comments)
30. A Revolution in How Robots Learn (50 points | 10 comments)
